Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Silver is my favorite color... My husband liked it,
too.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Purple is my favorite color, other than silver...
My husband used to give me purple flowers.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
This place reminds me so much of my own
home long ago, far off in another place and
time...

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Oh, now what's this? Did you put all this here
just to give me a good laugh? Thank you.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Phew, can I sit here? I'm a wee bit tired.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Th-this is quite a fancy bench. Is it made for
sweethearts?

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Way back when, there were scarecrows all over
the fields. Ah, this brings back memories.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
These flowers are beautiful. ...Oh, are they not
for sale?

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
What a perfect place to relax these tired old
bones.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
It feels like a temple here. So peaceful and
calm...

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Oh, that's a snowman, isn't it? Why, I used to
make all kinds of snowfolk way back when...

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Pink carnations are so beautiful. I love them.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
You wouldn't know it to look at me now, but
once upon a time, folks compared me to a pink
carnation...

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
There was a street lined with maidenhair trees,
where my husband and I used to walk... So
many memories...

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Crops grown here are so delicious. I'm coming
back here again, no question.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
There're more crops here'n last time.
I've made sure to buy as many as I can.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
I bought a fair bundle of rare crops, but I'm not
sure I remember how to cook them all...

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
I've never seen some o' these crops before, as
best I recall. Surprising, honestly, to find them
tucked away in a town like this.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Oh my, there're so many goods for sale I don't
know where to start.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Hm? How can I help ya?

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
This town and my hometown have a lot in
common. Both right there in the midst o' nature,
they are.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
My, this town's picked up the pace since I came
here last. Ho ho, that's good for me.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
This town's got itself in a big dang hurry, bein'
famous and all. This crowd makes me feel kinda
lonely, to be honest with ya.

<NAME_MOB_JANKA>
Guess this town went and got itself world
famous.
<PAGE>
I miss the old days, y'know? The peace and the
quiet, all gone now...
